text: Oladele Brendon Ayanbadejo (born September 6, 1976 in Chicago, Illinois) is an American football Linebacker and Special teamer for the Baltimore Ravens of the National Football League (NFL). He has played for 8 NFL teams as well as 3 CFL teams. He played college football at UCLA. He won Super Bowl XLVII with the Ravens when they defeated the San Francisco 49ers 34-31. ==Other websites== *Brendon Ayanbadejo at NFL.com Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:American football linebackers Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:BC Lions players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Winnipeg Blue Bombers players
title: Brendon Ayanbadejo
